flavor: Waiting is useless. The crisis is here; pick a side.
stripped_text: The first time each turn you suffer core damage, you may draw 1 card and sabotage 2. (The Corp trashes 2 cards of their choice from HQ and/or the top of R&D.)
text: The first time each turn you suffer core damage, you may draw 1 card and sabotage 2. (The Corp trashes 2 cards of their choice from HQ and/or the top of R&D.)
title: Esâ Afontov: Eco-Insurrectionist

flavor:
We're all alike down here
Androids are friends we salute
Give us all a f***ing break
Ol' Jack is the s*** on my boot.
stripped_text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, sabotage 4. (The Corp trashes 4 cards of their choice from HQ and/or the top of R&D.)
text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, sabotage 4. (The Corp trashes 4 cards of their choice from HQ and/or the top of R&D.)
title: Chastushka

flavor: We can change the world, if we're willing to be changed in return.
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, suffer 1 core damage. Gain clickclickclick.
text:
As an additional cost to play this event, suffer 1 core damage.
Gain [click][click][click].
title: Running Hot

flavor: Reactive implants reclaim the memories of our fallen comrades. Their sacrifice is our shield.
stripped_text: Draw 3 cards. When this event is trashed from your grip or stack, you may draw 2 cards.
text:
Draw 3 cards.
When this event is trashed from your grip or stack, you may draw 2 cards.
title: Steelskin Scarring

flavor: Arming the resistance with disarming charm.
stripped_text: When you install this hardware, suffer 1 core damage. The play cost of each event is lowered by 1 credit.
text:
When you install this hardware, suffer 1 core damage.
The play cost of each event is lowered by 1[credit].
title: Ghosttongue

stripped_text: +1mu You get +3 maximum hand size. When you install this hardware, suffer 1 core damage. Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, sabotage 1. (The Corp trashes 1 card of their choice from HQ or the top of R&D.) Limit 1 console per player.
text: +1[mu] You get +3 maximum hand size. When you install this hardware, suffer 1 core damage. Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, sabotage 1. (The Corp trashes 1 card of their choice from HQ or the top of R&D.) Limit 1 console per player.
title: Marrow

flavor: "Sometimes being a union rep calls for action even more... direct."
stripped_text: The first time each turn you install a virus program, sabotage 1. (The Corp trashes 1 card of their choice from HQ or the top of R&D.)
text: The first time each turn you install a virus program, sabotage 1. (The Corp trashes 1 card of their choice from HQ or the top of R&D.)
title: Avgustina Ivanovskaya

flavor: A single spark is all that it takes to destroy billions of credits... or to burn away the rot that ravages our world.
stripped_text: click, trash, suffer 1 core damage: Run a remote server. During that run, cards in the root of the attacked server lose all abilities. When that run is successful, trash all cards in the root of the attacked server.
text: [click], [trash], suffer 1 core damage: Run a remote server. During that run, cards in the root of the attacked server lose all abilities. When that run is successful, trash all cards in the root of the attacked server.
title: Light the Fire!

flavor: Flaws hold both beauty and opportunity.
stripped_text: When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you dont have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) The first time each turn you make a successful run on your mark, gain click.
text: When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you don’t have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) The first time each turn you make a successful run on your mark, gain [click].
title: Nyusha "Sable" Sintashta: Symphonic Prodigy

flavor: Neneciğim would be proud.
stripped_text: Run any server. If successful, instead of breaching the attacked server, access 1 card in the root of another server. If that card is an agenda, you cannot steal or trash it during this access.
text: Run any server. If successful, instead of breaching the attacked server, access 1 card in the root of another server. If that card is an agenda, you cannot steal or trash it during this access.
title: Pinhole Threading

stripped_text: +1mu When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you dont have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) The first time each turn you make a successful run on your mark, if that server is HQ, access 1 additional card when you breach HQ. Otherwise, breach HQ when the run ends. Limit 1 console per player.
text: +1[mu] When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you don’t have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) The first time each turn you make a successful run on your mark, if that server is HQ, access 1 additional card when you breach HQ. Otherwise, breach HQ when the run ends. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Virtuoso

flavor: I can show you a carpet, a fish, a magical tale...
stripped_text: The rez cost of each piece of code gate ice is increased by 1 credit. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength.
text: The rez cost of each piece of code gate ice is increased by 1[credit]. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
title: Cat's Cradle

flavor: The feel of flour-fine coffee, the scent of caramelizing sugar, the gentle heat of the flame. A ritual I never forget.
stripped_text: 2 recurring credits (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits during runs on central servers.
text: 2[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits during runs on central servers.
title: Cezve

flavor: "Aim with your eye. Shoot with your mind. Break with your soul." –Sundog
stripped_text: When you install this program, place 6 power counters on it. Interface -> trash or hosted power counter: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2 credits: +3 strength.
text: When you install this program, place 6 power counters on it. Interface → [trash] or hosted power counter: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
title: Revolver

flavor: If there's anything to be learned from our android cousins, it's that there's no shortcut to perfection. Consider all your options.
stripped_text: trash: Gain 3 credits. trash: Remove 1 tag.
text: [trash]: Gain 3[credit]. [trash]: Remove 1 tag.
title: No Free Lunch

flavor: The sea is everything; its breath must remain pure and healthy.
stripped_text: The first time each turn a run on R&D begins, you may charge 1 of your installed cards. (Add 1 power counter to a card that already has one.)
text: The first time each turn a run on R&D begins, you may charge 1 of your installed cards. (Add 1 power counter to a card that already has one.)
title: Captain Padma Isbister: Intrepid Explorer

stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run on HQ, R&D, and Archives this turn. The Corp must set aside the top 8 cards of R&D faceup. Access 1 of those cards. You may spend click to access another 1 of those cards. Then, the Corp shuffles the set-aside cards into R&D.
text:
Play only if you made a successful run on HQ, R&D, and Archives this turn.
The Corp must set aside the top 8 cards of R&D faceup. Access 1 of those cards. You may spend [click] to access another 1 of those cards. Then, the Corp shuffles the set-aside cards into R&D.
title: Deep Dive

flavor: Edie doesn't mind the noise. She's happy just being nearby.
stripped_text: Install 1 program or piece of hardware from your grip, paying 3 credits less. You may charge that card if able. (If it has a power counter on it, add another.)
text: Install 1 program or piece of hardware from your grip, paying 3[credit] less. You may charge that card if able. (If it has a power counter on it, add another.)
title: Rigging Up

stripped_text: +2mu When you install this hardware, place 3 power counters on it. The first time each turn you make a successful run, place 1 power counter on this hardware. 2 hosted power counters: Break up to 2 subroutines. Limit 1 console per player.
text: +2[mu] When you install this hardware, place 3 power counters on it. The first time each turn you make a successful run, place 1 power counter on this hardware. 2 hosted power counters: Break up to 2 subroutines. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Endurance

flavor: "That's him at the front, then there's Scout, Jonesy, Parker, Buča, Squee, Boots... you get the idea."
stripped_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, you may charge 1 of your installed cards. (Add 1 power counter to a card that already has one.)
text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, you may charge 1 of your installed cards. (Add 1 power counter to a card that already has one.)
title: Daeg, First Net-Cat

flavor:
"Why are we here? No one else is going to do independent testing, that's why."
–Padma Isbister
stripped_text: Whenever you install a program or piece of hardware, place 1 power counter on this resource. When there are 4 or more hosted power counters, trash this resource and gain 9 credits.
text:
Whenever you install a program or piece of hardware, place 1 power counter on this resource.
When there are 4 or more hosted power counters, trash this resource and gain 9[credit].
title: Environmental Testing

flavor:
"The Midnight-3 glows with an inviting warmth that belies the broken promise within. All that awaits you there is a life of indentured servitude."
–Sundog
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, draw 3 cards. Skip your discard step this turn.
text: When you score this agenda, draw 3 cards. Skip your discard step this turn.
title: Midnight-3 Arcology

flavor:
"The promise of a new home, safe work and friendly neighbors will draw in tens of thousands of eco-refugees, no matter which corner of the world they are from."
–Thule employee handbook
stripped_text: When your turn begins, gain 2 credits.
text: When your turn begins, gain 2[credit].
title: Refuge Campaign

flavor:
At depths no human tech can reach, a Trieste proxy can manipulate a mindscape with unparalleled precision.
<champion>Designed by 2019 NISEI World Champion Oliver "Pinsel" Siccha</champion>
stripped_text: When you rez this asset, choose 1 rezzed piece of bioroid ice. Runner card abilities cannot break subroutines on the chosen ice.
text: When you rez this asset, choose 1 rezzed piece of bioroid ice. Runner card abilities cannot break subroutines on the chosen ice.
title: Trieste Model Bioroids

flavor: End the run. End the run. End the run. End the run.
stripped_text: Whenever you rez a piece of harmonic ice, place 1 power counter on this ice. This ice gains "Subroutine End the run." for each hosted power counter.
text: Whenever you rez a piece of harmonic ice, place 1 power counter on this ice. This ice gains "[subroutine] End the run." for each hosted power counter.
title: Echo

stripped_text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may derez another installed card. If you do, the Runner cannot use paid abilities printed on bioroid ice for the remainder of this turn. Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Do 1 core damage. Subroutine End the run.
text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may derez another installed card. If you do, the Runner cannot use paid abilities printed on bioroid ice for the remainder of this turn. Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage. [subroutine] End the run.
title: Hákarl 1.0

flavor: With networks, growth is exponential.
stripped_text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may search R&D for a piece of ice and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that ice to HQ. Subroutine Gain 1 credit for each rezzed piece of harmonic ice.
text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may search R&D for a piece of ice and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that ice to HQ. [subroutine] Gain 1[credit] for each rezzed piece of harmonic ice.
title: Wave

flavor: <champion>Designed by 2018 North American Champion Sam Suied</champion>
stripped_text: After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends. Place 4 advancement counters on 1 installed card. You may score that card, if able. Remove this operation from the game.
text:
After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends.
Place 4 advancement counters on 1 installed card. You may score that card, if able.
Remove this operation from the game.
title: Big Deal

flavor: Some tests require specific conditions.
stripped_text: X is equal to the number of cards in the Runner's grip.
text: X is equal to the number of cards in the Runner's grip.
title: Blood in the Water

flavor: Prey and seawater sucked in, all in the space of a millisecond.
stripped_text: When your turn begins, gain 1 credit. Then, if you have 4 credits or less, do 1 net damage.
text: When your turn begins, gain 1[credit]. Then, if you have 4[credit] or less, do 1 net damage.
title: Bladderwort

flavor: Ethereal beauty laced with the most elegant venom.
stripped_text: When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may trash 1 card from HQ to do 2 net damage. Subroutine Do 1 net damage.
text:
When you rez this ice during a run against this server, you may trash 1 card from HQ to do 2 net damage.

title: Anemone

flavor: Digital refuse is their food, and you should never come between an animal and its food.

text:
While this ice is protecting Archives, it gets +3 strength.
[subroutine] Do 3 net damage.
title: Bathynomus

flavor: One becomes many.
stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Install up to 2 cards from HQ, creating a new remote server each time. Place 2 advancement counters on each of those cards. You cannot score or rez either of those cards this turn.
text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Install up to 2 cards from HQ, creating a new remote server each time. Place 2 advancement counters on each of those cards. You cannot score or rez either of those cards this turn.
title: Mitosis

flavor: Viruses, runners; all are food to them.
stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this upgrade in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this upgrade, you may purge virus counters. If this upgrade is rezzed, do 1 net damage. trash: Purge virus counters.
text: While the Runner is accessing this upgrade in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this upgrade, you may purge virus counters. If this upgrade is rezzed, do 1 net damage. [trash]: Purge virus counters.

text: The first time each turn the Runner makes a successful run, you may place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance.

text: When you score this agenda, the Runner loses 7[credit].

flavor: The only thing that changes is the uniform.

text:
You can advance this asset.

flavor: These are merely symbols. It is our fear which gives them power.

text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, remove 1 tag.

title: Backroom Machinations

flavor: Straddling the banks of the Ob River, this metropolis contains hope for a better tomorrow.

text: You can advance this upgrade. 2 hosted advancement counters: Place 2 advancement counters on another card in the root of this server that you can advance. Use this ability only once per turn. Limit 1 region per server.
title: Vladisibirsk City Grid

flavor: Take all that is offered, and more.
stripped_text: Whenever you trash a rezzed card, except during installation, you may search R&D for 1 card with a printed rez cost exactly 1 credit less than the trashed card's printed rez cost. Install and rez the card you found, ignoring credit costs. Use this ability only once per turn.
stripped_title: Ob Superheavy Logistics: Extract. Export. Excel.
text: Whenever you trash a rezzed card, except during installation, you may search R&D for 1 card with a printed rez cost exactly 1[credit] less than the trashed card's printed rez cost. Install and rez the card you found, ignoring credit costs. Use this ability only once per turn.
title: Ob Superheavy Logistics: Extract. Export. Excel.
